00010 DbSolver::DbSolver(Assembly const &assembly, EUROPA::TiXmlElement const &cfg) {

00014 DbSolver::~DbSolver() {

00021 bool DbSolver::noMoreFlaws() const {
00022   EUROPA::IteratorId iter = m_solver->createIterator();
00023   bool ret = m_solver->noMoreFlaws() && iter->done();
00024   delete (EUROPA::Iterator *)iter;
00025   return  ret;
00026 }
00027 
00028 bool DbSolver::inDeliberation(EUROPA::EntityId const &entity) const {
00029   EUROPA::SOLVERS::DecisionStack const &decisions = m_solver->getDecisionStack();
00030 
00031   for(EUROPA::SOLVERS::DecisionStack::const_iterator it=decisions.begin();
00032       decisions.end()!=it; ++it) {
00033     if( entity->getKey()==(*it)->getFlawedEntityKey() )
00034       return true;
00035   }
00036   return false;
00037 }
